== Irimbranallur (627787) ==

Irimbranallur is a village in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 646 hectares and harbouring 784 households with total population of 3200 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chavakkad]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 1406 and female population is 1794. Scheduled Caste Population is 194 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 627787<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
